thread.title: Vox Populi: 'Shame on Tybee Island Council members. No show? No vote!'
thread.title_full: Vox Populi: 'Shame on Tybee Island Council members. No show? No vote!' | savannahnow.com

author: DispatchDaemon
title: Vox Populi: 'Shame on Tybee Island Council members. No show? No vote!'
text:
“When are you going to make the Android app available for the E-Edition of SMN?” [Editor’s note: The E-Edition works on Android devices as well as iOS. Download it from Android or Apple.]
“Listening to the Democratic presidential candidates was quite confusing. I thought Democrats were against torture!”
“There has been a broken down car southbound on Truman Parkway for two weeks. It’s really hard to see early in the morning.”
“Did you see the Democratic debate? No clowns, no nutcases, no bigots. How refreshing!”
“Sponsoring the Tybee Candidate Forum is a public service that benefits all the residents of Tybee. Stop the paranoia. Nobody is out to get you.”
“Shame on Tybee Island Council members. No show? No vote!”
“I’d like to give a shout out to the Islands YMCA for their Play Like a Champion program. My special-needs grandson really enjoyed doing gymnastics, and there was no cost. It’s great they’re opening up an opportunity for special-needs children to do sports.”
